title: So Young a Queen
description: The story of Queen Jadwiga of Poland (1374?-1399) http://www.gallowglass.org/jadwiga/SC...All the bells in Krakow rang when the young Hungarian princess, Jadwiga, soon to become Queen of Poland, rode to her coronation. Her snow-white horse stepped proudly on the pathway of petals, as though he knew that the princess sitting on his saddle was the most beautiful lady in the whole of Cristendom.
author: Lois Mills
